detaileddescription.para: Copy function. This function dynamically allocates memory for a layer instance and instantiates a copy. The caller is responsible for deallocating the instance.
Get the layer type's name. A layer type name should be brief, human-readable description of the layer's mathematical operation.

Get data layout of the data tensors. We assume that the data layouts of the previous activations, activations, previous error signals, and error signals are the same. Each concrete layer that is templated on its data layout should override this function to return its template parameter.
Setup tensor dimensions Called by the setup function. The base method sets the dimensions of the activation tensors equal to the dimensions of the first previous activation tensor.
Get list of pointers to other layers.
Set list of pointers to other layers.
Perform the computation for the forward propagation step.

inbodydescription.para: Only update the number of samples processed by this parallel reader, when it is the current root

xrefdescription.para: should this distribute the entire matrix even if there is only a partial mini-batch

detaileddescription.para: Perform the computation for the backward propagation step.
